1.0.name: wordpress/livejournal-shortcode
1.0.description: Links to LiveJournals have a very distinctive look: the icon followed by the journal name. This shortcode follows the same format as LiveJournal's own markup and provides the same results, which you can easily customize with your own CSS styles.
